welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chetumal, the charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich Mayan heritage, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Marisquería El Taco Loco
restaurants.description: Marisquería El Taco Loco is a seafood restaurant located in Chetumal.
restaurants.address: Av. José Maria Morelos #87 (e/ Plutarco Elías Calles e Ignacio Zaragoza), 77000 Chetumal, Quintana Roo
